duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee human resources analyses and be an effective resource for change management.
Provide vital information to aid in critical organizational decisions.
Develop strategy, long-range planning, and lead the division’s talent, leadership, and culture processes.
Lead forecasting and planning of the talent pipeline.
Ensure leadership and coaching culture is cascaded through the supported groups.
Partner with other HR leaders to develop the global HR long-range plan and annual operating plan.
Drive the people processes, i.e.: performance, development, and career.
Lead human resources analyses and provide insights on talent and leadership performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources Management or related field, or equivalent education and experience.
Extensive knowledge of principles & practices of HR, including HR regulations and compliance.
Experience building and delivering change management and organizational development strategies.
Experience in building business plans for global groups and HR strategy development.
Experience working daily with C-level Operations Management.
Minimum five years related professional, progressive experience in human resources with a minimum of three years management experience.
